text: John Barry Pierce (13 August 1934 – 7 August 2020), known as Barry Pierce, was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for Crystal Palace, Millwall, York City and Exeter City, in non-League football for Truro City and Salisbury City, and was on the books of Everton and Stockport County without making a league appearance. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Liverpool Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Everton F.C. players Category:Stockport County F.C. players Category:Truro City F.C. players Category:Crystal Palace F.C. players Category:Millwall F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Exeter City F.C. players Category:Salisbury City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Barry Pierce
